code: @Test public void testInheritErrorHandlerDefault() throws Exception {     counter = 0.     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(0).     getMockEndpoint("mock:dead").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     assertEquals(3, counter). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     errorHandler(deadLetterChannel("mock:dead").maximumRedeliveries(2).redeliveryDelay(0)).     from("direct:start").process(new MyProcessor()).to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             errorHandler(deadLetterChannel("mock:dead").maximumRedeliveries(2).redeliveryDelay(0)).             from("direct:start").process(new MyProcessor()).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     counter++.     exchange.setException(new IllegalArgumentException("Damn")). }
